description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese on a sesame seed bun.
Pasta with a mix of fresh vegetables and marinara sauce.
Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
Marinated pork cooked on a vertical spit, served with onions, cilantro, and pineapple in a corn tortilla.
Warm chocolate brownie topped with vanilla ice cream and chocolate syrup.
